snippet.title: Hot Pixel - PlayStation Portable Gameplay
snippet.description:
Before Atari Mania on the PlayStation 4 and 5, Atari tried their hand at a WarioWare-inspired game on the PSP with Hot Pixel, featuring 200+ microgames that are all happening in a pixellized universe mixed from street culture, digital lifestyle and old-school style video games. Additional games could also be downloaded from the developer's website and are imported via a memory stick, although the website itself has been long gone and its domain has been purchased by some sketchy online casino.

Hot Pixel, Atari related content (C) Atari
BattleZone related content (C) Rebellion
Developed by zSlide S.A.S.

#retrogames #retrogaming #atari #hotpixel #psp #playstationportable #theforeseenarcade #microgames #street #streetculture #street_culture

GOOFS AND ERRORS: Sorry about the sudden PPSSPP overlay pauses and fast forward screw-ups. I tend to fiddle around with the trigger and analog stick buttons.
